tns:patch.author: Constantin Dolghier
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_mondrian_activity_currency_numbers; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_mondrian_activity_currency_numbers AS SELECT aav.amp_activity_id AS amp_activity_id, CASE WHEN ppc.date IS NOT NULL AND ppc_currency.amp_currency_id IS NOT NULL THEN ppc.date ELSE NULL END AS ppc_transaction_date, CASE WHEN ppc.date IS NOT NULL AND ppc_currency.amp_currency_id IS NOT NULL THEN to_char(ppc.date, 'J')::integer ELSE NULL END AS ppc_date_code, CASE WHEN ppc.date IS NOT NULL AND ppc_currency.amp_currency_id IS NOT NULL THEN ppc_currency.amp_currency_id ELSE NULL END AS ppc_currency_id, CASE WHEN ppc.date IS NOT NULL AND ppc_currency.amp_currency_id IS NOT NULL THEN ppc.amount ELSE NULL END AS ppc_transaction_amount, CASE WHEN rpc.date IS NOT NULL AND rpc_currency.amp_currency_id IS NOT NULL THEN rpc.date ELSE NULL END AS rpc_transaction_date, CASE WHEN rpc.date IS NOT NULL AND rpc_currency.amp_currency_id IS NOT NULL THEN to_char(rpc.date, 'J')::integer ELSE NULL END AS rpc_date_code, CASE WHEN rpc.date IS NOT NULL AND rpc_currency.amp_currency_id IS NOT NULL THEN rpc_currency.amp_currency_id ELSE NULL END AS rpc_currency_id, CASE WHEN rpc.date IS NOT NULL AND rpc_currency.amp_currency_id IS NOT NULL THEN rpc.amount ELSE NULL END AS rpc_transaction_amount FROM amp_activity_version aav LEFT JOIN amp_funding_amount ppc ON ppc.amp_activity_id = aav.amp_activity_id AND ppc.type = 0 LEFT JOIN amp_funding_amount rpc ON rpc.amp_activity_id = aav.amp_activity_id AND rpc.type = 1 LEFT JOIN amp_currency ppc_currency ON ppc_currency.currency_code = ppc.curr_code LEFT JOIN amp_currency rpc_currency ON rpc_currency.currency_code = rpc.curr_code ORDER BY amp_activity_id;
